title: AMD Ryzen X570 Motherboards Look AMAZING!
description: AMD has finally announced their 3rd Gen Ryzen 3000-series processors and with them, the X570 motherboards.  In this video we take a closer look at the MSI X570 motherboards like the X570 Godlike, X570 ACE and X570 Gaming Pro WiFi.  These could be some of the best Ryzen motherboards yet.    We would like to thank Phanteks and Steelseries for making this trip to Computex 2019 possible  Subscribe    This video is sponsored by Phanteks and Steelseries. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #ryzen3000 #X570 #computex2019 #hardwarecanucks
